description: TraceHub coordinates correlated tracing across the Temporal Loom with governed audit storage and export controls.

prerequisites: Obtain TVA + Sentinel approval for persistent retention
procedure: 1) Flush session buffers to the session_path and compute SHA-256 manifests.
2) Copy approved entries to export_path with TVA seal metadata (ledger id, approver, timestamp).
3) Update TVA ledger with export manifest reference and release TraceHub writers.
manual_export.notes: Use audit router toggle_semantics to switch store_in targets from *.session to *.export when fulfilling user export requests.
